description.english: Defeat Crimson Knight and Azure Knight.
Team up with Pi and reach the Grassfields.
Team up with Pauline and get back to the surface.
Take the money from ACK2's stash.
Beat Alvis and the Ancient Weapon in the final battle.
Beat Bravio for the last time.
Beat Oreen for the last time.
As Starter, get 50HP, 30 battery, all weapons, and all weapon upgrades.
Get 50HP as Starter and 30HP as Avatar Duo.
Get the Spin Attack for Avatar Duo.
Got the Hammer ability for Avatar Duo.
Win the battle as Corrupted Starter and unlock the bad ending.
Beat the game on Normal difficulty or higher.
Beat the game on Hard difficulty or higher.
Beat the game on Brutal difficulty.
Failed to stop the Ancient Weapon... Oh well.
Unlock the True Ending and beat the Celestial Nightmare, Astralis.
Get Starter's signature weapon, the Comet Blaster.
Beat any Boss Rush mode on Normal difficulty or higher!
Beat any Boss Rush mode on Hard difficulty or higher!
Beat any Boss Rush mode on Brutal difficulty!
Defeat the Astral Experiment and help Rane.
